SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.TITLE:
Smart
Governance
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.SUBTITLE: Digital Government and Transparency.
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: We integrate strategies to improve and optimize the processes of public administration and government, in addition to promoting the principles of openness and transparency to bring governments, citizens, and companies closer based on Information and Communication Technologies.

SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.TITLE:
Smart
Economy
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.SUBTITLE: Financing and Business Models.
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: We generate development plans that encourage the spirit of innovation, creative ability, and the capacity for change and transformation.

SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.TITLE:
Smart
Mobility and
Infrastructure
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.SUBTITLE: Connected Mobility and Infrastructure.
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: We manage sustainable transport systems that are environmentally friendly and have effective energy consumption, using ICTs to monitor and provide a more suitable service offer to different users.

SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.TITLE:
Smart
Environment
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.SUBTITLE: Sustainability and ESG Services.
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: guidance in the development and implementation of clean energies and the efficient use of water and waste management, based on the correct management of projects and sustainable use of natural resources.

SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.TITLE:
Smart
Habitat and
Services
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.SUBTITLE: Security and Quality of Life.
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: We encourage and guide the creation of networks and infrastructures that allow participation in areas such as e-health, e-culture, e-tourism, and e-security.

SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.TITLE:
Smart
Society
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.SUBTITLE: Society and Digital Inclusion.
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: We guide the structuring and administration of the project, manage associations and financing, and efficiently design public infrastructures and services.

ABOUT.LABEL: Smart City.
ABOUT.TEXT1: A holistic system where human and social capital interact, using ICT-based solutions.
ABOUT.TITLE2: The purpose of a Smart City is to achieve efficient management
ABOUT.TEXT2: meeting the needs of the city and its citizens.
ABOUT.TITLE3: Consulting and advisory in smart city management
ABOUT.TEXT3: National and international services with an ethical, sustainable, and innovative approach.

CONTACT_FORM.HEADING: Contact us if you have questions or comments about the topic, or register to receive more information about smart cities.

INFORMATION.MISSION_TEXT: To devise intelligent solutions for the technological and sustainable development of cities and communities, always seeking the inclusion and accessibility of people.
INFORMATION.VISION_TEXT: To develop and create city and human settlement projects worldwide that promote inclusivity and guarantee accessibility, security, resource optimization, affordability, and sustainability to achieve prosperity and quality of life.
